abstract: A list of ubiquity attributes used to generate and send notifications whenever an attribute in the list changes.
overview:
## Discussion

Valid attributes include the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLResourceKey/isUbiquitousItemKey] attribute and any attribute whose name starts with `ubiquitousItem` or `ubiquitousSharedItem` (or `NSURLUbiquitousItem` or `NSURLUbiquitousSharedItem` in Objective-C).

If the property is not implemented, the system generates notifications for all the ubiquity attributes.

The system checks this property only when the file coordinator’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator/addFilePresenter(_:)] method is called. Make all changes to this property before calling [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator/addFilePresenter(_:)].

# observedPresentedItemUbiquityAttributes

**Instance Property**

A list of ubiquity attributes used to generate and send notifications whenever an attribute in the list changes.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var observedPresentedItemUbiquityAttributes: Set<URLResourceKey> { get }
```

## Discussion

Valid attributes include the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLResourceKey/isUbiquitousItemKey] attribute and any attribute whose name starts with `ubiquitousItem` or `ubiquitousSharedItem` (or `NSURLUbiquitousItem` or `NSURLUbiquitousSharedItem` in Objective-C).

If the property is not implemented, the system generates notifications for all the ubiquity attributes.

The system checks this property only when the file coordinator’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator/addFilePresenter(_:)] method is called. Make all changes to this property before calling [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator/addFilePresenter(_:)].

## Ubiquity Change Notifications

- **presentedItemDidChangeUbiquityAttributes(_:)**: Tells your object that the file or file package’s ubiquity attributes have changed.
